author: xmha97
body:
Hello, I can't install any module using `Install-Module`
For example:
```powershell
Install-Module -Name Microsoft.Graph.Users.Calendar
```
![Windows Terminal](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/23485114/88271128-f8b1bc80-cceb-11ea-9bc6-79ea473f9b76.png)
Please help me.

comments.author: xmha97
comments.body:
I can install the modules only using below command:
```powershell
Install-Module -Name Microsoft.Graph.Users.Calendar -AllowPrerelease -Scope CurrentUser -Force -SkipPublisherCheck
```
Do you know why?

comments.author: SeeminglyScience
comments.body: Judging by the error message, it looks like they published a module with a bad autheticode signature and the prerelease version is fixed.

comments.author: SydneyhSmith
comments.body: I can't reproduce this issue, is it still being seen?

comments.author: xmha97
comments.body:
> 
> 
> I can't reproduce this issue, is it still being seen?

Thank you
Apparently, this problem has been resolved.
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/23485114/119379586-ea9a4700-bcd4-11eb-8db6-e2f14ce240cb.png)

comments.author: msftbot[bot]
comments.body: This issue has been marked as external and has not had any activity for **1 day**. It has been be closed for housekeeping purposes.

title: Install-Module not works
